name: Indian Spiced Buttermilk Drink Vegan Chaas Recipe
description: Indian Spiced Buttermilk Drink Vegan Chaas Recipe. Masala chaas. Savory non dairy Yogurt Drink with Mint, cumin and ice cubes. Indian Summer Beverage. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1 cup non dairy unsweetened plain yogurt
1/2 tsp ground cumin  (or roasted ground cumin)
Mint leaves or cilantro leaves for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the first 8 ingredients in a blender until frothy. It will take 2 to 3 minutes to froth well. Taste and adjust salt(kala namak or plain salt). Add a pinch of sweetener if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into glasses. Press mint leaves between your fingers to release a bit of flavor and add as garnish. Sprinkle with ground cumin.
